<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete multiple rooms"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/delete/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Soft-deletes multiple rooms in a single batch operation. Use this to remove rooms from active use without permanently deleting their records.

**Prerequisites**
1. **Room IDs** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query rooms to determine the list of IDs to delete.
2. Submit: [DELETE /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/delete/batch](/docs/api/locations/delete-location-rooms-batch) with the ID array.
3. Restore later using [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}/undelete](/docs/api/locations/undelete-location-room) if needed.

**Minimal Required Fields**: Array of room IDs.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

</RequestSchema>
